casebody.data:
City of Columbus, Appellee, v. Copley, Appellant.

[Cite as Columbus v. Copley (1996), 77 Ohio St.3d 1202.]

(No. 95-1828 Submitted October 9, 1996 Decided November 6, 1996.) Ronald J. O’Brien, City Attorney, David M. Buchman, City Prosecutor, and Brenda J. Keltner, Assistant City Prosecutor, for appellee. *1203Max Kravitz, for appellant.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
